remarks: Convert comparison of atom with sum of subspaces to a comparison to sum with atom.  ( ~ elpaddatiN analog.)  TODO: any way to shorten this? (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsmsat.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsmsat.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lsmsat.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lsmsat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsmsat.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lsmsat.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
lsmsat.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lsmsat.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsmsat.n $e |- ( ph -> T =/= { .0. } ) $.
lsmsat.l $e |- ( ph -> Q C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) $.
lsmsat $p |- ( ph -> E. p e. A ( p C_ T /\ Q C_ ( p .(+) U ) ) ) $.
$d .(+) p $.
$d A p $.
$d Q p $.
$d T p $.
$d U p $.
$d W p $.
